org.mechio.integration.animation_motion

Class DefaultAnimationPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jflux.api.core.util.DefaultNotifier<org.mechio.api.animation.protocol.AnimationSignal>
      • org.mechio.integration.animation_motion.DefaultAnimationPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jflux.api.core.Notifier<org.mechio.api.animation.protocol.AnimationSignal>, org.mechio.api.animation.player.AnimationPlayer

    public class DefaultAnimationPlayer
extends org.jflux.api.core.util.DefaultNotifier<org.mechio.api.animation.protocol.AnimationSignal>
implements org.mechio.api.animation.player.AnimationPlayer
    AnimationPlayer which creates AnimationJobFrameSource and registers them with the OSGi service registry to be used as FrameSources.
    Author:
    Matthew Stevenson
